text: Wayne Allard (born December 2, 1943) was a Republican U.S. Senator from Colorado. He served in the United States Senate from 1997 to 2009. He was in the United States House of Representatives from 1991 to 1997. Allard was born on December 2, 1943 in Fort Collins, Colorado. He graduated from the Colorado State University. He is married to Joan Malcolm. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Colorado Category:United States senators from Colorado Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Veterinarians
title: Wayne Allard
